### Abbreviations

- CS: Cattle slurry (control)
- WB: Fresh wheat bran/grain product mix
- S0: Wheat bran/grain product mix digested by larvae (frass) and used freshly
- S2: Wheat bran/grain product mix digested by larvae (frass) and stored for 2 weeks
- S4: Wheat bran/grain product mix digested by larvae (frass) and stored for 4 weeks
- S8: Wheat bran/grain product mix digested by larvae (frass) and stored for 8 weeks

## Data availability

The data that support the findings of this study are openly available in the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) at [https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/) under the accession number [PRJEB56631](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/view/PRJEB56631).
